Title: Stephen Rose Talks About Windows vNext, IE9 and inTune!
Description: Richard and Greg talk to Stephen Rose about where Windows is going. Stephen gives us some hints about Windows vNext and some ideas on how IT Pros are going to be able to manage the new diversity of devices coming into the workplace. Stephen also spends some time talking about the IE9 Release Candidate, Windows 7 SP1 and announces Windows inTune! inTune is a cloud-based management console for small to medium businesses - bringing together all the different tools built into Windows to manage them more effectively.
